backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing inquiry records with submission, lookup, and listing functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting up the root element and loading the React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the MarketingPage.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with navigation links, branding, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with navigation, branding, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/features/marketing/content/: Exports shared contact details for phone, email, and location.
frontend/src/features/marketing/forms/In: Form component handling inquiry input, validation, submission, and success/error states.
frontend/src/features/marketing/forms/in: Defines inquiry form data types and validates fields like name, email, message, and consent, returning errors if invalid.
frontend/src/features/marketing/hooks/us: Hook that submits inquiry data through the backend actor, handling phone parsing and loading/error states.
frontend/src/features/marketing/Marketin: Page layout composing hero, services, about, contact sections plus header and footer.
frontend/src/features/marketing/sections: Renders an About section highlighting agency values with descriptive cards and text content.
Displays contact details and renders the inquiry form within a styled contact section.
Hero banner with headline, CTAs, smooth-scroll behavior, and a featured image.
Presents a grid of service cards describing the agencyâ€™s marketing offerings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity context, login handling, and AuthClient setup for Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, extended theme settings, and typography/container-query/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the HS Media Agency website requirements, existing features, and pending feature requests.
